description: A React component named 'Row' that renders a horizontally scrollable row of ExerciseCard components with TV D-pad navigation support. It manages focus and selection logic within the row and handles user interactions such as item selection.

methods.name: Row({ id = 'row', title, items = [], onSelectItem, initialIndex = 0 })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a horizontally scrollable list of ExerciseCards with D-pad navigation. Props include id, title, items, onSelectItem, and initialIndex. Manages focus and item selection.

ctags.name: Row
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Row({ id = 'row', title, items = [], onSelectItem, initialIndex = 0 }) {$/
